quest.name: Wilred Wants You
journal: Hremfing has a secret message for you.
It seems a young fellow named Wilred wants a word with you in private. Make your way to the designated meeting point, a rocky area north of the settlement.
Somewhat predictably, the rendezvous turns out to be a trap. Wilred and his cronies fall upon you, but you succeed in overpowering them. Question Wilred and learn of his agenda.
Wilred manages to give you the slip, but not before mentioning a plan to bring down the Empire. Gundobald will want to know of this.
Gundobald is troubled to learn that Wilred and his companions will stop at nothing for their plan. What could the young ones possibly mean to do?

dialogue.name: HREMFING
dialogue.text: Hey, adventurer. You done talking with the old bear?

dialogue.name: HREMFING
dialogue.text: I've got a message for you from Wilred. Lad's something of a leader among the young ones here.

dialogue.name: HREMFING
dialogue.text: He's impressed that you've won over Gundobald, and wants a word with you. Says he'll be waiting over at the craggy area north of here.

dialogue.name: WILRED
dialogue.text: Thanks for coming, friend. 'Tis no ordinary outsider who can gain the trust of the old bear. That's why I wanted to meet you, to discuss something in private.

dialogue.name: WILRED
dialogue.text: Tell me...why are you snooping about? Did the Empire send you? Or someone else?

dialogue.name: WILRED
dialogue.text: Coeurl got your tongue? Hmph, no matter. Whoever it is you work for, your meddling ends here. Get herhim!

dialogue.name: WILRED
dialogue.text: I won't let you foil our plan!

dialogue.name: WILRED
dialogue.text: This changes nothing! Threaten us, beat us bloody all you like...but nothing short of death can make us give up our fight!

dialogue.name: WILRED
dialogue.text: We're going to obtain the power to bring down the Empire, and with it we'll reclaim our homeland!

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: Attacked by Wilred and his cronies!? That they would go to such lengths for the sake of this plan of theirs...

dialogue.name: GUNDOBALD
dialogue.text: Left to their own devices, the young fools are like to harm others, if not themselves. We must uncover their agenda and put an end to this madness.

obj.n: The Bear and the Young'uns' Cares
Big Trouble in Little Ala Mhigo
